mapper.select: select m_id from cy_member where m_id = #{id}
select h.h_pic,m.m_nick,m.m_today,m.m_totaltoday,h.h_msg from cy_member m join cy_home h on m.m_id=h.m_id where m.m_id=#{m_id}

SELECT m.m_id, m.m_nick, h.h_pic, v.v_num, v.v_text, to_char(v.v_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as v_time, v.host_id as v_hostId, v.guest_id as v_guestId FROM cy_visit v JOIN cy_member m ON v.guest_id = m.m_id JOIN cy_home h ON h.m_id = m.m_id where host_Id=#{m_id} ORDER BY v.v_num DESC

SELECT ga.g_num, ga.g_title, ga.g_pic, ga.g_text, to_char(ga.g_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') g_time, ga.m_id, ga.g_secret, ( SELECT COUNT(go.gg_good) FROM cy_gallery_good go WHERE go.g_num = ga.g_num AND go.gg_good = 1 ) AS good_count FROM cy_gallery ga where ga.m_id=#{m_id} ORDER BY ga.g_num desc
select b_hide_profile, b_hide_music, b_hide_diary, b_hide_gallery from cy_banner where m_id=#{m_id}

select f.f_num, h.h_pic, m.m_id, m.m_nick ,m.m_name, f.recieve_id, f.send_id from cy_member m join cy_home h on m.m_id=h.m_id join cy_friends f on f.send_id = m.m_id where f.recieve_id=#{m_id} and f.accept=0
mapper.update: update cy_friends set accept=1 where f_num=#{f_num}
mapper.select: select f.f_num, h.h_pic, m.m_id, m.m_nick from cy_member m join cy_home h on m.m_id=h.m_id join cy_friends f on f.recieve_id = m.m_id where f.send_id=#{m_id}
select f.f_num, h.h_pic, m.m_id, m.m_nick from cy_member m join cy_home h on m.m_id=h.m_id join cy_friends f on f.send_id = m.m_id where f.recieve_id=#{m_id}
mapper.update: update cy_home set h_msg=#{h_msg} where m_id=#{m_id}
mapper.select: select m.mu_title,m.mu_artist,mu_url from cy_play pl join cy_music m on pl.mu_code=m.mu_code where m_id=#{m_id} order by pl.pl_code
